video.title: Reckless
video.synopsis: A gorgeous Northern legal eagle and a charming Southern lawyer clash in and out of the courtroom in this soapy drama set in Charleston, S.C.

episodes.synopsis: When a disgraced Charleston, S.C., cop hires attorney Jamie Sawyer to represent her in a lawsuit against the police department, dark secrets emerge.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Jamie and Roy once again find themselves as courtroom rivals, this time in a heated custody battle over a 10-year-old boy.
episodes.title: Parting Shots

episodes.synopsis: When a man is arrested for shooting an intruder, Jamie takes the case. Meanwhile, a judge tells Roy and Jamie to try to settle Lee Anne's case.
episodes.title: Stand Your Ground

episodes.synopsis: Jamie and Roy work together to defend two boys accused of murdering their prep school football coach, a notorious disciplinarian.
episodes.title: Blind Sides

episodes.synopsis: Jamie tirelessly works to defend a pro bono client who was wrongfully accused of killing his girlfriend in a halfway house for troubled teens.
episodes.title: Bloodstone

episodes.synopsis: Roy is reluctant to defend a wealthy land developer who's engaged to his ex-wife, until he realizes he has something to gain from taking the case.
episodes.title: Family Plot

episodes.synopsis: Jamie and Roy face off in civil court over a wrongful death case; Lee Anne is shocked when another former employee decides to sue the department.
episodes.title: Deep Waters

episodes.synopsis: Roy defends Lexi Simms, his high school sweetheart and a hostess at an exclusive gentleman's club, who is accused of killing a former co-worker.
episodes.title: When the Smoke Clears

episodes.synopsis: Jamie represents a grieving widow in a case against an infamous shock jock. Meanwhile, Roy tries to get Terry to testify against Lee Anne.
episodes.title: Damage Control

episodes.synopsis: Roy and Jamie oppose each other in civil court, where Roy defends a man accused of murdering his lover; Charleston reels from the leaked sex tape.
episodes.title: Fifty-One Percent

episodes.synopsis: Jamie represents Vi's ex-husband, a plastic surgeon accused of medical malpractice; the love triangle between Preston, Roy and Jamie heats up.
episodes.title: And So It Begins

episodes.synopsis: Lee Anne's case goes to trial, pitting Jamie against Roy in the biggest courtroom battle of her life, with the burden of proof on her side.
episodes.title: Civil Wars (Part 1)

episodes.synopsis: Roy presents his witnesses and arguments in the Lee Anne Marcus case. As the case draws to a conclusion, sparks fly between Roy and Jamie.
episodes.title: Civil Wars (Part 2)
